snippet.title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails to Azure | TRAILER
snippet.description:
Trailer for the Geofront release of The Legend of Heroes: Trails to Azure.

You can find update news and installation instructions at: https://geofront.esterior.net/

Geofront Discord: https://discord.gg/sXx2Ck6Cxn

Geofront Twitter: https://twitter.com/GeofrontTeam

NOTE: Footage is of an *in-development* build and not reflective of the final release.

Producing: KillScottKill

Editing: KillScottKill and Choojermelon

Graphics Assistance: Addaberry and Sorcerian

Special thanks to Yotaka for his translation of the original trailer.

Zero no Kiseki (Trails from Zero) and Ao no Kiseki (Trails to Azure) are two connected role-playing video games developed by Nihon Falcom as a part of the larger The Legend of Heroes series. Together as a duology, they constitute the second story arc of the Trails sub-series, and take place three months after the end of The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky the 3rd and in a different country, Crossbell. The games star Lloyd Bannings, a rookie investigator within the Crossbell Police Department, joining three years after the death of his brother.

Zero no Kiseki was released in 2010 for PlayStation Portable. In 2011, the game was ported to PC for release in China and Japan. In 2012, it was later ported again for PlayStation Vita as Zero no Kiseki: Evolution, with improved visuals and full voice acting for the main story.

#TheLegendOfHeroes #TrailsToAzure #TheGeofront
